message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.

I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I've done some research and I know I can get it from another seller for that price, so I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget concerns.  However, $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  To make this work, I could come down to $17,000.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be careful with my finances.
